form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, A20 979 192

full_text: Screened by NARA, 4/27/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE #GPO 1974-561-638 Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 FEE STAMP File No. A20 979 192 APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION LOS Sec. 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, Sec. 245, I&N Act T/C: I&N Act MAR Sec. 214(d), I&N Act Sec. 249, I&N Act 17 Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 (DATE) (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM, USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1. I hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A. B. C. D. E. or F) A. As a refugee to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a person who entered the U.S. with a visa issued to me as the fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my entry, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Sec. 214(d), I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13, Act of September 11, 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&T Act) F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1. 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). 2. My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 3. Sex Male Female PALOS Bruno Ornelas 4. I reside in the United States at: (c/o) (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City) (State) (ZIP Code) 5. Have you ever applied before for permanent resident 290 Princeton Ave. Claremont, Calif. 91711 status in the U.S.? Yes No 6. My alien registration number 7. I am a citizen of (Country) 8. Date of Birth (If "Yes", give the date and place of filing and is final disposition.) 3967256 Mexico 10/6/14 March 12, 1943 9. Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) Teocaltiche Jalisco Mexico Los Angeles, Calif. 10. Name as appears on nonimmigrant document (Form I-94) None A20 979 192 I last arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) El Paso, Texas 1915 railroad train as a (visitor, student, crewman, parolee, etc.) my I-94 permit number is I was was not inspected. Permanent resident 11. My nonimmigrant visa, number . was issued by the on (Month) (Day) (Year) 12. I am single married United States Consul at City)(Country) none divorced widowed 13. I have been married 1 times, including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) a. Number of times my husband or wife has been married b. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) 1 Mary Molina c. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.)(No. & Street)(' or City)(Province or State) (Country) 14. a. I have 3 sons or daughters as follows: (Complete all columns as to each son or daughter: if living with you state "with me" in last column: otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at Robert L.A., Calif. 9/21/41 1212 Raymond, Ontario, Ca. Roger M L.A., Calif. 5/21/44 604 E. Harvard, Ontario, Ca. FOIA (b)(6) b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: none 15. I list below all organizations, societies, clubs, and associations, past or present, in which I have held membership in the United States or a foreign country, and the periods and places of such membership. (If you have never been a member of any organization, state "None".) Quarterback Club & Progresista Club UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D-TRANS. COMPLETED Immigration and Naturalization Service OUT Form I-485 (Rev. 5-1-74) Y (Page 1)
